cisc275.group3.scene

Class SceneBeachMini

  • java.lang.Object
    • cisc275.group3.scene.Scene
      • cisc275.group3.scene.SceneBeachMini
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConstructCrab

    public class SceneBeachMini
extends Scene
implements ConstructCrab
    Bonus Beach mini-game to be unlocked after completing a beach mission. Primarily used to introduce fun, alternative play mechanics with little to no educational value.

    The objective of this game is to "drag" your crab across the screen in a race against two npc crabs.

    SceneBeachMini.java

    Author:
    Scott

        Used when SceneId must also be created
        Parameters:
        n - String-scene name
        x - double-x-coordinate of upper left corner
        y - double-y-coordinate of upper left corner
        w - double-scene width
        h - double-scene height
        bg - String-file location of bg image
        sceneType - EnumSceneType-type of scene

        public void update()
        Movement for npc crabs. NPC crabs are differentiated by their ID.

      • update

        public void update(double dx)
        Overloaded movement for user controlled crab. User crab differentiated by ID.
        Parameters:
